Package com.BrickDestroyController

Class HomeMenuController

java.lang.Object
com.BrickDestroyController.HomeMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class HomeMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
This is the Controller for the HomeMenu, which is the introductory screen. All Mouse Events that occur in the HomeMenuView, the DebugConsle's View, are handled.
